mobs.long_desc: A tomb robber is looking through the debris here.
mobs.desc: A heavily built, masked man is standing here, looking through the rubble. He looks like he does not want to be disturbed.
The skeleton still has richly coloured rags on its body. It looks like it was once one of the elite bodyguards which guarded the king.

mobs.long_desc: A cat hisses at you for trespassing.
mobs.desc: A black cat stands up from its resting place and glares menacingly at you. It seems to try to scare you away from this place.

mobs.long_desc: A giant snake is coiled up in a corner.
mobs.desc: You have come face to face with the biggest python you have ever seen. It looks like it wants you to meet its digestive system.

mobs.long_desc: An imperial guardsman challenges your presence.
mobs.desc: A very lifelike guardsman glares at you for disturbing his pharoah's rest. He challenges you to fight him in order to pass.

mobs.long_desc: The mummy of Imanhotep is resting here.
mobs.desc: Imanhotep was a very large man in life, and it seems that death has made him even larger and stronger. You wonder if you would be able to survive this encounter.

mobs.long_desc: Queen Neris stands near her husband's tomb.
mobs.desc: Neris is rather slight of build but legend has it that she was once very beautiful. You find it rather hard to see her beauty under all those bandages.

mobs.keywords: chief-guard guard chief giant man aaros
mobs.long_desc: A muscular giant of a man looks down on you.
mobs.desc: You stand face to chest to the greatest guard captains who ever lived, Aaros. Of course, he is supposed to have been dead for the past 300 years, but he doesn't seem to know that.

mobs.keywords: ranger young elf mysteriously cloaked figure
mobs.long_desc: A young ranger is here pacing back and forth.
mobs.desc: The young, slender elf has flowing silver hair and piercing blue eyes.  Shiny chain mail is barely visible under an outer layer of clothing the ranger is wearing, which does little to hide the vast assortment of weapons he is carrying.  Moving with a noble grace he paces swiftly back and forth as if awaiting someone's arrival.

objects.ground: A golden burial mask gleams under a film of dust.

extras.text: The mask is made of solid gold and is encrusted with jewels.  It has an aura of power around it.

objects.ground: A golden sceptre glitters in the light.

extras.text: The sceptre is made of pure gold, and is encrusted in jewels.  Intricate carvings depicting wings snakes decorate this majestic rod.

objects.ground: A scimitar lies among the rocks here.

extras.text: The scimitar is very well crafted and has a fine balance. You detect an aura    holiness around it.

objects.ground: A short, curved sword lies in the dirt.
A golden burial mask gleams under a film of dust.

extras.text: The mask is made of solid gold and is encrusted with jewels.  It has an aura of power around it.

objects.ground: A clay flagon sits in a corner.
A large pot sits in a corner.
A large ironbound chest lies under a film of dust.

extras.text: The chest looks like it was made to hold treasure. Upon examination, you realize that it is locked.

objects.ground: A large, colorful carpet is rolled up here.

extras.text: This carpet is woven of very rich materials.  Strangely, it seems to have water stains on it, as if it has gone through a cloud.

objects.ground: A large, leather bound tome sits on a shelf.

extras.text: The book is large and heavy, and is sealed with red wax.  Large, golden words are set in its cover.  There is a tingling sensation as you touch this tome, making you realise that this must be a book of power.  One of its stories tells of a visit from a band of powerful sorcerers who were impressed with Neris' kindness and presented her with a holy scarab that has some power to it.  The leader of the sorcerers is shown speaking aloud to Neris refering to her as "Neris'Kaan", or "Neris the Kind".

objects.ground: A golden sarcophagus lies against the wall.

extras.text: The sarcophagus is well crafted and was sculpted in the image of the pharoah,   Imanhotep.

objects.ground: A pile of grain lies on the ground.
A number of mixed coins are scattered about.
A ruby scarab lies at your feet.

extras.text: The ruby was cut in the shape of a scarab, one of the holy symbols of this land.

objects.ground: A handful of coins lays on the ground.

triggers.name: neriskaan speech pyramid
triggers.commands: wdoor 16271 n room 16267 wecho &3&bDust fills the air as a wind groans by you flowing to the north.&0 wecho &3Massive pillars of stone open to form a new passage.&0 return 0

triggers.name: pyramid_entrance_newbie_guard
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 if %actor.level% < 40 laugh %actor.name% whisper %actor.name% You should go try somewhere a little more manageable for you. wait 1 whisper %actor.name% You will grow to adventure here soon enough. bow else return 0 endif else return 0 endif

rooms.name: Outside the Pyramid
rooms.description: You are standing just outside the mighty pyramid of Imanhotep.  To the north, you can make out the tomb's entrance, covered with the sands of time.

rooms.name: Tomb Entrance
rooms.description: You step into the tomb of the great pharoah of old, Imanhotep.  As you peer into the stifling darkness of the passageway, you can hear the shuffling of feet in the distance.  Someone has come here before you, but who?

South.description: A large stone blocks your exit back into the outside world.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  This was a design of the original builders to trap trespassers who dare break into a pharoah's tomb.  You wonder what other devices await you here.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the south.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Passageway Junction
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway splits into a junction, with passages leading east and west.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

North.description: There is a movable panel here! There is a passageway behind it.

rooms.name: Small Chamber
rooms.description: As you enter this chamber, a stone block falls behind you, sealing you in here.  This must be another one of the ancients' traps.  You notice that there are stairs leading down and a rope ladder leading up.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

South.description: You see the outline of the secret panel here.

rooms.name: Dead End
rooms.description: You have come to a dead end in the passage.  The only exit you can see is a small narrow staircase leading upwards.

rooms.name: Bend In The Passage
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the west.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the north.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the west.

East.description: You notice that there is a secret panel here.

rooms.name: Treasure Room
rooms.description: You have stumbled upon one of the many treasure rooms in this pyramid. Large jars and chests are stacked up all over, and the walls are painted with murals on the life and deeds of the pharoah.  Skeletons also litter the ground. You realise that these must be the workers who built this place.  Looks like the builders don't want witnesses.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: As you enter this chamber, a stone block falls behind you, sealing you in here.  This must be another one of the ancients' traps.  The only way you can go is south now.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Passageway

rooms.name: Treasure Room
rooms.description: You have stumbled upon one of the many treasure rooms in this pyramid. Large jars and chests are stacked up all over, and the walls are painted with murals on the life and deeds of the pharoah.  Skeletons also litter the ground. You realise that these must be the workers who built this place.  Looks like the builders don't want witnesses.  A staircase leads downwards into the depths.

South.description: There is a secret panel here.

rooms.name: Stair Landing
rooms.description: You have come to the top of the stairs and you find another series of winding passages.  You notice that the texture of the walls has changed a bit. Your fingers feel more soapy when you run them against the walls.  The passageway continues to the east.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

East.description: You find another panel hiding a passageway here.

You realise that these must be the workers who built this place.  Looks like the builders don't want witnesses.  A staircase leads upwards into the darkness.

South.description: There is a secret panel here.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead end.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

rooms.name: Secret Chamber
rooms.description: You have entered a room littered with bones, human bones.  You realise that this is the chamber where they buried most of the workers alive.  You notice a lot of scratch marks on the walls, they must have tried to dig their way out. When you turn around, you find that the panel has closed behind you.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  A stone block falls behind you, leaving you only one option, to go south.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the east.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the south.

rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead end.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the west.

rooms.name: Stair Landing
rooms.description: You walk deeper into the depth of the pyramid, and the air gets cooler as you go forward.  There is a more earthy smell here, though the walls are still made of limestone.  You finally come to the bottom of the staircase and find another maze.  Will this never end??

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead ends.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead ends.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

East.description: Thin cracks in the wall reveal a hidden panel.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: You find that the passageway has closed behind you.  You can only go forward now.

rooms.name: Passageway Junction
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passage branches off at this point, one passage going south and another going east.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Passageway Junction
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passage branches off at this point, one passage going south and another going north.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead ends.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

rooms.name: An Intersection
rooms.description: You have come to an intersection going in four directions.  You wonder which one you should take as they all look the same to you.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  A stone block falls behind you, leaving you only one option, to go west.

rooms.name: Passageway Junction
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway splits into a junction, with passages leading north and south.

West.description: There is a secret panel here.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Bend In The Passage
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the west.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead ends.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: You find that the passageway has closed behind you.  You can only go forward now.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Mural Chamber
rooms.description: You have entered a chamber which is totally painted with murals of the dead pharoah.  You realise there us something different about this room as there seems to be more emphasis on the afterlife when you study the hieroglyphics. Perhaps this is the true burial chamber of Imanhotep VI.  A passageways leads downwards into the depths.

East.description: A brightly painted panel blocks your way.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

West.description: Behind the murals painted on this wall you find a hairline crack. There is a panel here.

rooms.name: Small Chamber
rooms.description: You find yourself trapped in a small chamber when the doors closed behind you.  There is no escape from here.

South.description: You think you might be able to pry the panel open.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead ends.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

West.description: A stone panel blocks your way.

rooms.name: Passageway Junction
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passage branches off at this point, one passage going south and another going west.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead ends.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

North.description: A stone panel blocks your way north.

rooms.name: Door Chamber
rooms.description: You have entered a round room with doors all around it.  Every direction looks the same to you and you feel disoriented.

rooms.name: Treasure Room
rooms.description: You have stumbled upon one of the many treasure rooms in this pyramid. Large jars and chests are stacked up all over, and the walls are painted with murals on the life and deeds of the pharoah.

rooms.name: Passageway Junction
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway splits into a junction, with passages leading east, north and south.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  This was a design of the original builders to trap trespassers who dare break into a pharoah's tomb.  You wonder what other devices await you here.

East.description: There is a stone panel here.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

West.description: There is a stone panel here.

rooms.name: A Dead End
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  You walk on until you reach a dead end.  This passage leads nowhere!  You wonder what was the purpose of all these dead ends.  Maybe they hide some more rooms.

extras.text: This wall seems to be covered with more hyroglyphics than the others. It shows Neris and Imanhotep in the royal hall with a group of sorcerers. The head sorcerer speaks something aloud which seems to cause Neris great pleasure....

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the west.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.  The passageway bends towards the east and north.

rooms.name: Passageway
rooms.description: The walls of the passageway are made of extremely large and heavy blocks of limestone.  As you walk deeper into the pyramid, your footsteps echo down the passageway, giving an eerie feeling to this place.

rooms.name: Stairs Landing
rooms.description: You find yourself at a stairs landing.  There is a passageway going towards the west from here.

rooms.name: Burial Chamber
rooms.description: You are in the burial chamber of the great Imanhotep VI, 98th in the line of Hoth, descendent of the Sun God.  The walls are painted with the pictures of Imanhotep and his lovely wife Neris.  It is said that Neris commited suicide in order to join her husband in death.  A small tunnel leads to the west.

East.description: A large door blocks your way eastwards.

extras.text: On the walls around the undead you notice pictograms of their life and times.  The great advancements made by Imanhotep in the building of cities and monuments is stunning. The common people are depicted as being lower life forms not worthy of life itself.  Imanhotep was a cruel ruler and had no concern for his people. Neris is then introduced into the story and she changes Imanhoteps treatment of his people.  The next series of hyroglyphs are unreadable but it seems Neris possessed a very powerful magical ruby scarab on a short staff. The scarab was a gift from a group of sorcerers who had heard of her kindness. The last set of writing shows a grand hall with the King and Queen, the group of sorcerers making the presentation, many members of the royal court line the walls watching in approval, there is also a royal scribe writing into a large book.
There seems to be a hole in the wall that you can just squeeze into.

rooms.name: Great Door
rooms.description: You come to the end of the passageway and see a large door blocking your way westwards.  Bones of decapitated humans litter the ground.  It seems that there were others before you who came this way and had come to an abrupt end in their journey.

West.description: The door is made of stone and is brightly painted with the image of Imanhotep. Yonder lies the burial chamber of this great pharoah.

rooms.name: Burial Passageway
rooms.description: There is a lingering smell of incense and spice here, and an aura of power can be felt.  It is like great magic was once performed here and traces still remain.  The passageway continues west.

rooms.name: Door Chamber
rooms.description: You have entered a round room with doors all around it.  Every direction looks the same to you and you feel disoriented.

rooms.name: Door Chamber
rooms.description: You have entered a round room with doors all around it.  Every direction looks the same to you and you feel disoriented.

rooms.name: Door Chamber
rooms.description: You have entered a round room with doors all around it.  Every direction looks the same to you and you feel disoriented.
